about_the_game:
Sado Maso is on a twisted quest against hostile entities and to seek out supreme dominance and toxic masculinity. Help him reach full release in this crazy adventure. May Trigger many, even frat boys. It's Rated N for Not a Baby Sitter. Makes fun of Game Glitches, Politicians, Dirty Things, Mocks Types of Criminals, everything I could get to.
NSFW. A lot of hidden dungeons, and items and it isn't made easy to find your way through the game. It's very old school. Like talk to villager old school, and all that sort of stuff.
If you can see this, Steam over see-ers realize it's not being sold to a General Audience.

Features:
Simple control scheme, reverses a bit on Steam Link.
It runs like a standard old Top Down RPG, look around for things, some areas require certain items and certain party members to receive them.
In fact all 4 Party members are the only way to get back to the Throne Room.
Game play is pretty basic, but search and discovery is a must.
Some surprise NPC actions.
There are jokes about things from AAA Glitches to Politics. Certain things like "Poison" are STD, and stuff like that.
Until I end up making other language versions, if I do, more might get added for free, no promises.
Blue Humor.
Not PC, but not a Alt-Right Love Fest.
Hand Drawn, Scanned Monsters.

legal_notice:
Most monsters by me. Humor/Story by me, The Black Jester (Comedian name for: Gölök Z Buday) full intellectual rights and responsibilities reserved.
All jokes, gags, images, and IP taken from this must be attributed to the creator, some assets were native to RPG Maker Ace 4, as was the Engine. Coding was too boring. But it's a good one, I liked it. No one but the creator is responsible for the hurt feelings (well actually you are), offense, or vomiting it may cause. By the way, I highly recommend keeping hydrated. The Game is Rated N: For Not A Baby Sitter under the GZLFB Parody Rating System. If kids see this, I and Steam no one else is responsible but the parents. This game could get you fired if seen in an office or referred to at work, see HR to see Blue Humor guidelines in your workplace.

movies.name: Original Trailor: My Disdain For Them

name: Slave Master: The Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32 Bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core AMG Turion
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Most since 2010
  • Storage: 500 MB MB available space
  • Sound Card: Most Modern
  • Additional Notes: The range is as tested, any comparible machines should work.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32 or 64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD A10-9600P Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radion R 5
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most Modern
  • Additional Notes: The range is as tested, any comparible machines should work.

publishers: The Black Jester and Realm of the Mental Midget Slayer
